post_title: FS - T206 Griffith Portrait SC 150/30 - PSA 3
post_content: UP for sale is a T206 Clark Griffith Portrait with Sweet Caporal 150/30 reverse.  This card has been graded PSA 3.  $270 pp ff which includes shipping, please pm if interested and thanks for looking.  Bob Intrieri.
I will take Griffith PM sent  Thanks Eddie
